alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Clinton; Hamilton; Howard; Tippecanoe; Tipton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:05AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Carroll, southeastern Tippecanoe, Clinton, Howard, Boone, northwestern Hamilton, Tipton and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 205 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Delphi to 11 miles northwest of Crawfordsville. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Tipton and Windfall. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 133 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for central, north central and west central Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Clinton; Hamilton; Howard; Tippecanoe; Tipton
